name: JTAC Beats
description:
THE NEW DRUM MACHINE BASED STRATEGY GAME.
Gear up, soldier, and ready the drums of war. Get in the groove to demolish your enemies

• Four Campaigns to fight through

Four campaigns to fight through with escalation of weaponry.

• Five Unique Instruments of War

Create epic beats of war on your wardrums using 5 weapons in place of real life instruments.

• Fourty Unique Beats to master!

With 10 levels per campaign, each campaign has unique beats totaling 40 beats to groove to.

• Fun Ragdolls

Infantry ragdolls flail around when you take them out.
